meanings.definition: Having the most box-like shape or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The boxiest building in town is the one with the square windows.
meanings.sent2: The package was the boxiest one on the shelf, standing out among the rest.
meanings.sent3: The boxiest car on the road looked like a giant cube rolling down the street.
meanings.sent4: Her room was the boxiest of all, with everything neatly organized in square containers.
meanings.sent5: The boxiest present under the tree was the most intriguing, begging to be opened first.

meanings.definition: Comparatively more box-like than anything else.
meanings.sent1: Out of all the shapes, the square was the boxiest one.
meanings.sent2: The boxiest package was the easiest to stack due to its shape.
meanings.sent3: The boxiest cake at the party looked like a delicious cube waiting to be eaten.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the boxiest of all, resonating like a perfectly shaped container.
meanings.sent5: The boxiest room in the house felt cozy and snug, like a square hug.
